analysis.name: SOLIDITY_LOCKED_MONEY
analysis.content: contractGame{addresspublicgovernance;constructor(address_governance)publicpayable{governance=_governance;}functionclaim(addresspayablewho)public{require(msg.sender==governance,"Game::claim: The winner must be approved by governance");selfdestruct(who);}

analysis.name: SOLIDITY_VISIBILITY
analysis.content: (msg.sender==governance,"Game::claim: The winner must be approved by governance");
